content.rendered:
Directed by K.S. Ravikumar.

Written by M. Rathnam. M. Rathnam. K.S. Ravikumar.

Cast Nandamuri Balakrishna(Narasimha). Nayanthara(Gauri). Haripriya(Manga). Natasha Doshi(Dhanya). Prakash Raj(Master). Brahmanandam(Raju Reddy). Ashutosh Rana(Thota Rami Reddy).Murali Mohan.Prabhakar.Chandra Sekhar.Sivaji Raja.Mamilla Shailaja Priya. L.B. Sriram((as Sriram L.B.)).Ravi Prakash.Jayaprakash Reddy.Sandhya Janak . Kartar Cheema(ACP Ravi Shanker)

Language Telugu.

Producers Kalyan C. Patsa Nagaraj. C.V. Rao. Varun.

Production CK Entertainments.
